    • Method Detail

      • split

        public void split()
        Split method Takes the potdeck and splits it in half. Adds the first half to player 1's deck. Adds the second half to player 2's deck.

      • getP1

        p1 Player 1's deck

      • Check

        public String Check(Card c1,
                    Card c2)
        Check This method compares player 1 and player 2 card. Returns the winner of the round.
        Parameters:
        c1 - Player 1's card
        c2 - Player 2's card
        Returns:
        winner The winner of the round

      • War

        public void War(Card c3,
                Card c4,
                Card c5,
                Card c6)
        War This method is called when a war is evoked. It takes in 4 cards, 2 face down, 2 face up. It checks the 2 face up cards and adds the cards to the winner's deck.
        Parameters:
        c3 - Player 1's face down card
        c4 - Player 2's face down card
        c5 - Player 1's face up card
        c6 - Player 2's face up card

      • getWinner

        public String getWinner()
        getWinner method returns the winner of each round
        Returns:
        winner The player with the higher card
